questions.question_text: "framework" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A structured system or set of guidelines
questions.example_sentence: The company introduced a framework to standardize remote meeting practices.
questions.explanation:
枠組み・指針
一時的な会議室
支援制度
非公式な話し方

questions.question_text: "agenda" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A list of topics to be discussed in a meeting
A summary sent after a meeting
A technical issue during a call
questions.example_sentence: Clear agendas should be shared before scheduling virtual meetings.
questions.explanation:
議題
要約
技術的問題
社内方針

questions.question_text: "facilitator" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A person who guides and manages a discussion
A technician who fixes system errors
questions.example_sentence: The facilitator ensured balanced participation during the meeting.
questions.explanation:
進行役
傍観者
技術担当
予算承認者

questions.question_text: "concise" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Short and clear without unnecessary detail
questions.example_sentence: Organizers are asked to share concise meeting summaries afterward.
questions.explanation:
簡潔な
複雑な
デザイン重視
社外向け

questions.question_text: "misunderstanding" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A failure to understand something correctly
A delay caused by scheduling conflicts
questions.example_sentence: Written summaries help prevent misunderstandings among remote teams.
questions.explanation:
誤解
日程遅延
戦略変更
正式合意
